```{r}
require(tidyverse)
require(tigris)
require(sf)
require(pracma)
require(sp)
```


```{r}
acs = read_csv("./cleaned_data/acs_data.csv", show_col_types = F)
```


## PCA

```{r}
acs.vars = acs %>% dplyr::select(-geoid) %>%
  drop_na() %>%
  mutate(across(everything(), as.numeric))
         
acs_pca = stats::prcomp(acs, center = T)

```
